name: The Adventures of Old Man Cranky Pants
name_original: The Adventures of Old Man Cranky Pants
description:
For the GMTK Gamejam

Description
A simple three button platformer with tight controls and a bit of a learning curve.

How our submission matches the theme
To match the theme of the GMTKjam we tried to do as much as possible with just three buttons. Our jump button also acts as a dash button if executed while airborne, both the dash and the jump can be used to eliminate the bugs. The dash can also be used in defence against the seeds the flower throws, turning the flower into a spring to reach higher areas if done correctly.

The game's executable package or binary
Windows executable file

Intended platform
PC Windows

Resources used
LibGDX
Aseprite, Pyxel Edit beta, Tiled
#SoftMilk32 palette by mnrart http://mnrart.tumblr.com/tagged/color-palette
Made by Joe and Daniel, Spacefish Games

Oh hey! Thank you for taking the time to look at our little game. This was our first gamejam, and our first "completed" project in game development (quotation marks used as we of course had more features and content in mind that time did not allow for). Needless to say we learned a bunch doing this, and would very much appreciate any and all constructive criticism and comments. We look forward to sharing more games with you in the future, and good luck to everyone who participated in the first (hopefully of many) GMTK Gamejam!

Cheers, Joe and Daniel
Spacefish Games
